DOC.brief_summary: A randomized double-blind control two center study . The primary objective study show superiority hypnosis relaxation pain intensity patient neuropathic pain .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Study Efficacy Hypnosis Versus Relaxation Control Neuropathic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study : - show superiority hypnosis relaxation control group neuropathic pain . - show lasting effect treatment neuropathic pain one week end treatment . - evaluate clinical predictor response hypnosis ( nature neuropathic symptom , severity anxiety depressive symptom , pain catastrophizing , cop strategy , emotional regulation , response first session , positive negative emotional reaction end hypnosis session ) . - evaluate effect hypnosis long-term ( 1 , 3 6 month end treatment ) . - evaluate effect hypnosis emotional process . - compare hypnosis relaxation short-term effect pain , - evaluate quality life impact pain daily life : sleep , mood , anxiety symptom , analgesic consumption , neuropathic symptom , affective component pain pain catastrophizing . 35 patient enrolled arm , obtain 105 total ( 3 arm ) . Total duration patient : 8 month .
